name: Diamond Plaque GUI
description:
This very uniform, sleek design was made for visual novel purposes, but may be used for any type of game! Coming in the form of a PSD file allows you to make edits of all sorts to the look of this GUI- change the colors, change the backgrounds, use them as guidelines, honestly, your imagination is the limit!

This interface includes:

  • Character Stats Toggle
  • Dialogue/Text Box
  • Gallery
  • Save & Loads
  • Options/Preferences

This file may NOT be re-distributed unless edited in some way, shape, or form and MAY be used for both commercial and non-commercial projects.

~ "You buy it, it's yours."
